Enum SubType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SubType>
      • hackenbergerhollander.SubType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SubType>

    public enum SubType
extends java.lang.Enum<SubType>
    Represents the 3 different types of the monoalphabetic Cipher
    Author:
    Hackenberger Christoph
